extendedInfo.description: Want to take the Mediterranean Diet "on-the-go" with you? Now you can take the  Mediterranean Diet with you no matter where you go and lose your unwanted weight faster than you ever thought possible. This app will give you mobile access to the most cutting edge mediterranean diet recipes and tips so you can take your weight loss into warp speed.Inside this FREE app you will find 'little known' secrets and strategies that you can use to make the mediterranean diet work for you at the highest level possible.Heres a sneak peak at what you'll get insideâ¦*Sneaky tricks that will FORCE your body to shed weight at the fastest rate possible using the mediterranean diet meal plan*Secret 'fattening' foods that you can eat while on the mediterranean dietâ¦ that will actually help you lose weight FASTER* Easy to follow tips that you can use to obtain that sleek slender mid section or rock hard six pack that you've always desired*Step by step mediterranean diet recipes that few people have access to (plus they taste greatâ¦)* And much, much, moreâ¦Pick Up Your FREE Mediterranean Diet App Today And Take Your Weight Loss To The NEXT LEVEL!

reviews.title: Tiny text
reviews.comment: The text on this app is way too small even on my Galaxy Nexus\'s massive 4.65 in. Screen. Fix that and this app has potential.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very helpful
reviews.comment: I would love to have a recipe finder by ingredients, by now it provides helpful info.
reviews.author: A Google User
